title: Car Model - Overview Page - Basic
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to have a list of all CAR MODELs (incl. some basic information)\
So I can scroll through them to find interesting ones (e.g. strange name, very old, built for a very long time)
description:
# **Request**

* method: `GET`
* URL path: `/car-models` 

# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* an HTML page, displaying a list of all car model nodes

**Unhappy path**

* n.a. → when there are no car models an empty list is displayed → same status code (200)

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* all existing car model nodes are displayed in list form:
  * each item contains the primary information for a car model (name, built\_from, built\_to, internal\_code)
  * each item links to the respective car model detail page
* an appropriate message is shown when there exist no nodes of that node type

**Quality Gates**

* Behavior tests (Playwright) are extended
* Accessibility tests are extended
* Performance tests are extended
* Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* search/filter/sort/paginate within the list
* logo
* main navigation
* relationships (incl. images)
* statistics
